title: Shoujogata Seishoriyou Nikubenki
description:
1. Shokugyou 「Benki」 (Professional "Potty")
2. Akibeya Arimasu (For Rent)
Story goes that there’s this apartment management that offers you a “special room” to temporarily stay in, while waiting for your room to be available. Said “special room” comes with a complimentary nekkid girl who lets you do whatever you want to her.

3. Everyone's Lover: What is "Love"?
4. Everyone's Lover: What are "Friends"?
5. Everyone's Lover
6. Gurutto Keizai Nichiyoubi (Gurutto Sunday Economics)
7. Minna Ikiterunda (All Alive)
8. Shokugyou 「Benki」1.5 (Professional "Potty" 1.5)

Description taken from MAL.
